Secure and Private Network
Upload Multiple Images and Documents in Real Time
Create Multiple Units and Purchase Orders
Group Calling and Chat with SOS Calling
Create Events on Calendar
No personal information needed from any user other than one who creates the digital code for the project
Complete end to end encryption over secure SSL channels
Documents, Location, Images, All communications in one secure place
Use Web or Mobile to communicate for all features with Auto Sync between them
Create multiple units for personalized communication.
Simple interface to create purchase orders with multiple approval levels.
Secure chat interface with single and group chats with image file and location sharing
Single, Group Audio and Video calling interface with unlimited users and duration
Intuitive Calendar interface with multiple time zones designed for the film crews
Set Reminders for crew meetings, deadlines and countdowns.
